data.name: Silithid
data.description:
Silithid

Units:
+1.5 HP/sec regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-10% attack rate
+10% Hero buy cooldown

Buildings:
+25% HP/sec regeneration
no armor increase with building level

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: Swarm of hive minded insects with dedicated roles. Lacking full sentience, thus having no mages or casted spells. Spawns more units from infected enemies. Ruled by few humanoid overlords.

Difficulty: Advanced

(1500 range)

bonuses.name: Chameleon Skin [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shukuchi

Reduces spell damage to Scarab, Drone, Broodmother and Reaver by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.description:

+1 level of Redundant Organs

When Spawning Pool hit points drop bellow 10% a massive Swarm Host will be unleashed.
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can be unleashed manually)
(UW can bypass this skill)

Type: Base Defence / Suicide Run

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

towerUpgrades.name: Corrosive Spit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: acid bomb in 200 AoE
Affects: Wasp and Grubfly

Lv1: -2 armor, 8 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv2: -4 armor, 16 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv3: -6 armor, 24 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv4: -8 armor, 32 damage/sec for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Toxic Finale
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage after death
Affects: Grub and Colossus
(burns in 200 AoE)

Lv1: 15 damage/sec for 10 sec
Lv2: 20 damage/sec for 20 sec
Lv3: 25 damage/sec for 30 sec
Lv4: 30 damage/sec for 40 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Web
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to immobilize units
Affects: Drone and Dune Worm Lair
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: lasts 5 sec
Lv2: lasts 10 sec
Lv3: lasts 15 sec
Lv4: lasts 20 sec

spells.name: Web (Lv1)
spells.description:
Binds unit for 10 seconds.

(affects non-Hero units only)

spells.description:

towerUpgrades.name: Huge Claws
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and cleave in 150 AoE
Affects: Reaver and Colossus

Lv1: +6 and +12 damage, 15% cleave
Lv2: +12 and +24 damage, 25% cleave
Lv3: +18 and +36 damage, 35% cleave
Lv4: +24 and +48 damage, 45% cleave

towerUpgrades.name: Shukuchi
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: move speed and evasion
Affects: Drone, Broodmother, Wasp and Grubfly

Lv1: +6% move speed, +5% evasion
Lv2: +12% move speed, +10% evasion
Lv3: +18% move speed, +15% evasion
Lv4: +24% move speed, +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Redundant Organs
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration
Affects: All non-Hero units

Lv1: +4 HP/sec regeneration
Lv2: +8 HP/sec regeneration
Lv3: +12 HP/sec regeneration
Lv4: +16 HP/sec regeneration

towerUpgrades.name: Hard Exoskeleton
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and damage block
Affects: Scarab and Colossus

Lv1: +2 armor, 20% to block 30 damage
Lv2: +4 armor, 25% to block 40 damage
Lv3: +6 armor, 30% to block 50 damage
Lv4: +8 armor, 35% to block 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Spiked Carapace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and reflect to melee attacker
Affects: Scarab and Colossus

Lv1: +2 armor, 15 damage
Lv2: +4 armor, 30 damage
Lv3: +6 armor, 45 damage
Lv4: +8 armor, 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Neurotoxin
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and attack slow
Affects: Broodmother, Wasp and Grubfly
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 5 damage/sec, 5% slow for 15 sec
Lv2: 10 damage/sec, 10% slow for 15 sec
Lv3: 15 damage/sec, 15% slow for 15 sec
Lv4: 20 damage/sec, 20% slow for 15 sec

heroes.name: Prophet
heroes.description:

Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Tentacle Grasp (Damage Spell)
150-300 damage, 5 sec stun

Horror (Disable Spell)
disorientates units for 2-3 sec
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Sticky Webbing (Disable Spell)
25% move slow for 20-40 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Scarab Swarm (Damage Spell)
12 insects for 15-30 sec

Qiraji Overlord (Support Aura)
+15% speed to non-Hero units

30 damage/sec, 50% move slow
